title: Backend Development The Heart of Functionality
description: Managing data, server-side logic, and APIs to ensure robust and functional software applications.

quiz.question: Which aspect of backend development involves managing where all application data is stored?
What is the primary focus of database management in backend development?
options: B) Managing data storage, security, and optimization
quiz._answer: B) Managing data storage, security, and optimization

quiz.question: Which component of backend development involves writing server-side logic?
In the restaurant analogy, what represents the role of server-side logic in backend development?
Which responsibility is NOT part of server-side logic?
Which aspect of backend development involves coordinating with external services for data exchange?
Which element is crucial for ensuring the database's security and integrity?
What role does API integration play in backend development?
options: C) Ensuring seamless communication with other systems
quiz._answer: C) Ensuring seamless communication with other systems

quiz.question: Which of the following is an example of server-side logic?
options: A) Writing a function to handle user authentication
B) Optimizing the database for faster queries
C) Integrating a third-party payment gateway
quiz._answer: A) Writing a function to handle user authentication

quiz.question: Which backend development task is similar to a restaurant's coordination with suppliers?
